Alan and Ertac evaluate a randomised control trial. They randomly assign an educational intervention.

They are concerned with the correlation between non-cognitive skills and economic outcomes. In particular, existing literature in economics and psychology find that childhood and adolescence is an important period in the development of non-cognitive skills.
